column4: close firefox and mozilla, rename your ~/.mozilla folder and restart firefox, does it crash?
no that does not matter
close firefox and mozilla, rename your ~/.mozilla folder and restart firefox, does it crash?
I tried to uninstall firefox last night and it wouldnt let me
don't reinstall, in your home folder there is a hidden folder called .mozilla, i need you to find it and rename it while firefox is closed
give me a sec
no it actually created another .mozzila folder, I tried it twice
it should create another .mozilla folder when you start firefox
did firefox get to yahoo without crashing?
it goes to yahoo, but when I try to login it crashes
still after making a new profile
it goes to yahoo, only crashes when I try to login
you are a god
it works now with the new .mozilla?
why was that happening
the most likely reason is a confilicting problem with the free flash plugin and the adobe flash plugin. Having both makes firefox very unstable
it worked with firefox
if you need to recover some of the data in your old profile http://kb.mozillazine.org/Migrating_settings_to_a_new_profile is a very helpful article
I didnt really want the mozzila browser I just wanted to try an alternate browser to see if I got the same result
nah I just installed 4 days ago havent really done anything yet
thanx for all your help I was getting pretty frustrated with that problem
